title: I can't launch game or even get to the launch page
body: Every time i try and load up league of legends, i get an error message saying PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. This started happening when I went to my cousin's house a week ago. I didn't even use my computer that much other than going on crunchyroll or using youtube. I started having a problem where my computer wouldn't show any available network but that stopped once i got back to my house. I have uninstalled and re-downloaded league. At first it was giving me the same error message when i tried re downloading it but i restarted my computer and waited a couple days able to reinstall. I still get the message when i try to open it though.  Everything else on my computer works fine so i don't think i got a virus. I have been playing league since {{champion:157}} came out and i would be so heart broken if i can't play anymore. Please help :(

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors are most often caused by League not being assigned the right administrative privileges to run. Since League interacts with a lot of files that reside outside the League directory, it needs special rights. Our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) is a great place to start to ensure League is configured properly.

Let me know if you continue to see this issue.
I LOVE YOU {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} . I'M NOT GAY BUT IF YOU ARE A DUDE, YOU ARE THE ONE GUY I WOULD FUCK. I hope you win the lottery. P.S. it worked if you couldn't tell.
